30.ara-name: كتاب الوصايا عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Talhah bin Musarrif said:"I said to Ibn Abi Awfi: Did the Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) leave a will?' He said: 'No' I said: 'How is the will written, and how was it enjoined upon the people?' He said: 'It was ordered in the Book of Allah, Most High

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ النَّبِيَّ صلى الله عليه وسلم لَمْ يُوصِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related That The Prophet (ﷺ) did not Leave A Will
